parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token used to start the next query.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The resource IDs. You can specify a maximum of 50 resource IDs.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource. Valid values:

*   CLUSTER: MSE instance
*   GATEWAY: cloud-native gateway

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The list of tags. A maximum number of 20 tags are supported.
